item.title: What We're Learning
item.description: Regular Expressions In class, weâ€™ve been working on regular expressions that make it easier to find specific strings within chunks. There are a multitude of ways to find each expression that is being sought after. Below is a picture of the general symbols that are used in these equations. Regex Symbols We can use these expressions to run DNA sequences to look for restriction enzymes and predict where sequences will be cut and what fragments will make up the string.
